displayExactDate.description: Display exact date instead of relative

categories.description: Template categories ids and their accessLevels. Null or empty array if not within any category.

sharedTo.description: Mailboxes list, which have access to template

sharedToMailboxGroups.description: Mailbox groups, which have access to template

logoImageUuid.description: UUID of the template logo image

newEnvelopeCanBeCreated.description: Returns a flag whether a new envelope can be created using this template

publiclyShared.description: Returns a flag indicating whether the template is publicly accessible by code

defaultDownloadOptions.description: Returns a flag whether default download options should appear or only custom one

categories.description: Template categories ids. Empty array if not within any category.

sharedCategories.description: Template shared categories ids. Absent if not within any shared category.

sharedTo.description: Mailboxes to which template is shared to

sharedToMailboxGroups.description: Mailbox groups to which template is shared to

logoImageUuid.description: UUID of the template logo image

sharedTo.description: Mailboxes list, which have access to scenario

PermissionsDTO.description: Entity with user and permissions list

hideNameForAccounts.description: Hide mailbox name/aliases from other accounts
Hide mailbox name/aliases from other accounts

autoDelegateFrom.description: Auto delegate from date in 'ISO-8601' format

autoDelegateUntil.description: Auto delegate until date in 'ISO-8601' format

uuid.description: UUID of Label. Only for entity read from server.

in.description: Integration rule direction, true: in, false: out

matchingPatternSrc.description: File matching pattern source: name or content

zipStructureName.description: The name of pre-saved zip structure in the template

excludeZipFiles.description: Mask to exclude some files from ZIP. c - for signature/processing Certificate, p - for Printable version, a - for Audit trail

multipleEnvelopes.description: Rule using for creating multiple envelopes

attributes.description: Some additional attributes (XPATH can be used as a value)

items.description: XSD or SCH result validation file

IntegrationRuleValidationFile.description: XSD or SCH result validation file

mailboxUuid.description: UUID of Mailbox created this comment

mailboxName.description: Name of Mailbox created this comment

accessType.description: Access level ('official' is not allowed here)

EnvelopeApprovalRequestDTO.description: Fill only flow UUID or list of approvers

flowUuid.description: UUID of saved approval flow (Approvers must not be set)

approvers.description: Set of approvers (Flow UUID must not be set)

id.description: Identifier in DB. Shouldn't be set for creation.

logo.description: Account logo in base64 format (svg, png, jpeg)

brand.description: Account brand logo in base64 format (svg, png, jpeg)

allowCreatePersonalMailboxWithRole.description: Create personal mailbox for self-registered corporate user with role UUID

allowMicrosoftOfficeViewer.description: Allow envelope attachments public access for MS Office Viewer. Skip property for non-owner users.

logo.description: Account logo in base64 format (svg, png, jpeg)

brand.description: Account brand logo in base64 format (svg, png, jpeg)

allowCreatePersonalMailboxWithRole.description: Create personal mailbox for self-registered corporate user with role UUID

allowMicrosoftOfficeViewer.description: Allow envelope attachments public access for MS Office Viewer

access.description: Link access level, account-wide by default

items.description: Dynamic argument to build the message

succeed.description: Number of succeed conversions without assigned rule

failed.description: Number of failed conversions without assigned rule

mailboxUuid.description: UUID of mailbox for applying rule for

templateUuid.description: UUID of the template to use for generated envelope

in.description: Rule direction, true = IN, false = OUT

namingRule.description: Naming pattern rule. Tokens allowed: {mailboxUuid}, {envelopeUuid}, {randomNumber}, {templateUuid}, {date yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss}. Forbidden characters are: \/:?*<>|

map.description: XSLT map to use for transformation

fileName.description: File name generated by pattern rule from request

multiUse.description: Form multi use (true) or single use (false, default)

valueId.description: Field value id (for dictionary or attachments)

items.description: Dynamic argument to build the message

documents.description: Form documents map, key is document id, value is documents fields list

flow.description: Form flow map, key is role id, value is role mailbox UUID

items.description: Form anonymous roles, at least one anonymous role is required

multiUse.description: Form multi use (true) or single use (false, default)

signingCertificate.description: Certificate which will be used for signing

stampCertificate.description: Stamp Certificate which will be used for signing

skipBinaryFiles.description: Specify if original binary files are needed in response

stampCertificate.description: Stamp Certificate which will be used for signing

skipBinaryFiles.description: Specify if original binary files are needed in response

documentId.description: Document ID to create new comment thread

accessType.description: Access level ('official' is not allowed here)

excludeFiles.description: Mask to exclude some files. с - for signature/processing Certificate, p - for Printable version, a - for Audit trail

zipStructureName.description: The name of pre-saved zip structure in the template

items.description: Active role name (only when template is selected)

shared.description: Is envelope shared to the mailbox? (if the mailbox is not in the main flow)

sentByMe.description: Flag meaning 'outbox'. Probably not necessary on UI

receivedAt.description: Date of receiving the envelope by the mailbox

seenAt.description: Date-time it was seen by receiver

createdAt.description: The date the approval was created

accountUuid.description: Mailbox account UUID of approval initiator

seenAt.description: Date-time it was seen by approver

expiredAfter.description: The date the envelope will be expired

ReportEnvelopeRequestDTO.description: uuids or search parameters have to specified separately

QuickSendDTO.description: Send QuickSendDTO in BLOB format with Content-Type: application/json

approver.description: Is recipient an approver? (copy by default)

signer.description: Is recipient a signer? (copy by default)

PublicQuickSend.description: Send PublicQuickSend in BLOB format with Content-Type: application/json

agreed.description: Agreed with terms of the service

envelopeUuid.description: Envelope UUID in order to detect language

mailboxUuid.description: UUID of mailbox assigned to role

values.description: List of dictionary record values {columnUuid: fieldValue}

envelopeUuid.description: Envelope UUID, used for filtered dictionaries

templateUuid.description: Template UUID, used for filtered dictionaries

versionUuid.description: Template version UUID, used for filtered dictionaries

documentId.description: Document id, where field is located, used for filtered dictionaries

fieldName.description: Field name, used for filtered dictionaries

rowIndex.description: Row index, where field is located in table used for filtered dictionaries

filter.description: Values for filter columns, except filter by role

mailboxes.description: Mailboxes names. At least one mailbox name must be set.

keyword.description: Keyword to search by in: firstName, lastName, email

sort.description: Sort order by creation date, asc or desc

permissions.description: Permissions for current user to mailbox relation

ReportUsersRequestDTO.description: uuids or search parameters have to specified separately

keyword.description: Keyword to search by in: UUID, Name or Alias

ReportMailboxesRequestDTO.description: uuids or search parameters have to specified separately

hideNameForAccounts.description: Hide mailbox name/aliases from other accounts

filteredAccessOnly.description: Dictionary can be used only with filtering

email.description: Email for which invitation was created

allowMicrosoftOfficeViewer.description: Allow envelope attachments public access for MS Office Viewer

company.description: Is account registered as a company?

sharedTo.description: Mailboxes to which template is shared to

sharedToMailboxGroups.description: Mailbox groups to which template is shared to

logoImageUuid.description: UUID of the template logo image
UUID of the template logo image
UUID of the template logo image

theme.description: The name of the UI theme

allowUserApplicationTokens.description: Allow or deny user application tokens

allowUsersToRegister.description: Allow or deny users to register

allowAutoDeposite.description: Allow or deny users to set Auto Deposit Mailbox

allowManageNotification.description: Allow or deny users to manage notifications

in.description: Integration rule direction, true: in, false: out

matchingPatternSrc.description: File matching pattern source: name or content

receivedAt.description: Date of receiving the envelope by the mailbox

items.description: UUID of label for this envelope for this mailbox

completed.description: Number of participants who completed their processing

shared.description: Is envelope shared to the mailbox? (if the mailbox is not in the main flow)

mailboxName.description: Name of the mailbox role assigned to

order.description: Role order as defined in template

templateName.description: Name of the template of this envelope

total.description: Total number of roles assigned for processing of this envelope

completed.description: Number of roles completed processing of this envelope

CallbackEnvelopeDataDTO.description: This DTO is sent as a callback payload.

receiveDate.description: The date of the envelope was received

expireDate.description: The date of the envelope expiration

BillingHeaderState.description: Account billing top-most counter name and value

headerName.description: Counter header name, may contain '{}' for counter value

canLoginWithCode.description: User can be logged in by invitation code

existingUser.description: Is user already created in the service?
